data.detailsHTML: Hi, I’m Justin Robinson. A Software Development Engineer (SDE) for Amazon.com. Specifically I work on a team called Post Delivery Experience. We own two things. The first being what started our team, Ship-to-Store. We enable customers to utilize third party service providers that improve their post delivery experience. The second is a patented internal technical solution to a problem that remained unsolved until we launched Ship-to-Store. We’ll call this STSTech. STSTech enables several teams (including mine) and orgs to build their experiences and products both domestically and internationally. We don’t take ourselves too seriously and we’re not afraid to ask for forgiveness. We’re constantly having to do jobs outside of our scope of responsibility and have gained a reputation for finding and fixing problems we don’t own. Every person on my team is capable of leading a project from a business and technical standpoint; a rare feat at a company our size (not to mention the tactful deal slinging product manager we have). I love my team.
